data.title: Hire Lourdes Fernandez Flamenco Company
data.meta_description: Hire Lourdes Fernandez Flamenco Company, a Spanish folk band in London, plus a range of other Spanish folk band available to book with Encore.
data.text: Our company started in London in 2012. All members are exceptional professionals who studied in both Spanish and foreign conservatories, universities, and schools. Each of them dedicate themselves, body and soul, to art. To them, Flamenco is a way of life and of expressing their feeling. Passionate about creating a flamenco community, the performers are keen to bring the spirit of Flamenco to every corner of the UK and to share their love for this art. Lourdes Fernández has been dancing since she was five years old. From that moment on, her whole life developed through the learning of Flamenco. She studied dance at the Madrid Conservatory, graduated at Rey Juan Carlos University and completed her Masters in Performing Arts. Lourdes arrived to London in 2012. Since then, she has performed in renowned venues such as Ronnie Scott’s, The Union Chapel, Jazz Cafe, and Richmix. In addition, Lourdes participated in various festivals throughout the UK like the City of London Festival, the Birmingham Jazz Festival, the Brighton Festival, Salisbury festival. She is currently working as a dancer and choreographer. Our Flamenco company creates unique memories with dance and music, spreading energy, color, and a special charisma into your party. Close your eyes and our Flamenco show will transport you to Spain and beyond! You can hire us in different formats: Duo (option 1): Flamenco guitar - dancer Duo (option 2): Flamenco guitar - singer Trio: Flamenco guitar - singer - dancer Quartet: Flamenco guitar - singer - dancer- percussionist Quintet: Flamenco guitar - singer - dancer - percussionist - soloist * Soloist like violin, sax, flute available You can have more than one dancer if you wish, or singer, if you request it in advance. Regardless of the format, we will always provide you with the best and unique Flamenco experience.
